app.title: Travel Map
app.removeConfirm: Do you want to delete this place?
app.noLocationBrowser: This browser does not support location services.

location.notSupported: This browser does not support location services.

search.placeholder: Search places (e.g., restaurant, hotel, tourist attraction)

chat.title: AI Travel Agent
chat.welcome:
Ask anything about travel!
Save places to get help with your travel plan.
chat.hint: Ask about the {{count}} places currently found.
chat.error: Sorry, a temporary error occurred. Please try again later.

place.deleteConfirm: Do you want to delete this place?

welcome.title: Welcome to Travel Map!
welcome.subtitle: AI-based Travel Route Planning Recommendation Service
welcome.description: This app helps you plan your trip through place search and AI travel agent using Google Maps API.
welcome.feature1: Place Search: Find places you want. Search queries without location information (e.g., hotels, restaurants, tourist attractions) are searched based on the map location you are viewing.
welcome.feature2: Save Places: Select and save places of interest and share them with the AI travel agent.
welcome.feature3: AI Travel Agent: Provide your origin, departure time, duration, etc., and get faster and more accurate travel plans, recommendations, and routes displayed on the map based on saved places.
welcome.feature4: Setting the search radius and minimum rating will show search results according to your settings.
welcome.helpText: If you want to see the description again, please click the App Info & Settings button at the bottom left.
